content.detailedDescription: I had just picked up my boyfriend, at the time, at the new baltimore bridge.The bridge was closed. i would pick him up and we would drive threw ross ohio to take him home. he was driving up e.Miami river rd to ross. all of a sudden i saw an object coming out of the sky to my right. i told him to stop. the object had two head lights and it was descending. i said it looked like a jeep coming out of the sky. it flew overhead and hovered over the river. it went down the river below the treetops and came back up. all of this happened within eye shot. my boyfriend was so scared and so was i, we took off. took him home and i returned home. somehow i lost an hour that night. i got in trouble for being late. i still can't remember what i saw.I know i saw a craft but what it looked like, i can't remember. my ex still doesn't talk about it.
content.summary: Witnessed craft hovering over great miami river

content.detailedDescription:
I was at po'olenalena beach, wailea, maui photographing a couple after their wedding. i did not see the object during the photo session but after reviewing my files i saw a pyramidal shaped object in 2 frames. the object was brighter than the sunset sky and white in color while clouds showed warm hues of sunset. the frames show some sort of dark trail behind it, exhaust??  i've attached the full frame file and a detail from the two frames containing the craft.

i have been a commercial photographer for 45 years and currently i work w/ the uhawaii institute for astronomy at the tlrs4 laser ranging site on haleakala.  i am an observer for this system doing day and evening shifts.  i have seen aircraft at many distances while at my post but what i photographed is unknown to me.
content.summary: Seen after sunset in a photo

content.detailedDescription: Inwas between the ages of 6-9.I seen a light green light coming through the window and got up to look just then my step dad started yelling for everyone to get on the floor and stay away from the windows,of course i looked out.It was glowing green,circular,disk shaped object just hovering.My step dad started shooting at it with his rifle.I giggled because i knew,even at that age he couldn't hurt it.I felt a weird sense of happiness.It stayed there for a few seconds,even with my dad shooting at it and then shot off diagonally ,up towards the sky and south,then it was gone.A couple of days later i noticed something in my forefinger,it was a black line deep under the skin.I showed my mom and sister and they took me down and tried to dig it out with a needle.It was shiny and silver,once they got down far enough to see it.They picked at it for over an hour.You could hear that it was solid by the clicking noise it made as they tried to dig it out.I told them it was gone,just so they would   stop! the needle hurt.I noticed about a week later it was still there but told nobody because i knew they would try to get it out again.I heard my mom say to my aunt one day that she hoped that it didn't come from what ever was out over the house,and i knew it had to be.At times i can see a slight line still in my finger.I would imagine there would be something on it,there were other people outside their homes.My sister still remembers it too,we recently discussed that night.The newspaper locally was the messenger index.
content.summary: Born in 1959,when i was between the ages of 6-9 i seen a light outside my window,just as i went to get up i heard my dad yelling for everyone to get on the floor and stay away from the windows.I didn't obey,i looked out and i saw a large light green

content.detailedDescription: It would take a long time to to go into detail,or atleast to write it down here. but i would prefer to have someone call me. i want to get this off my chest or atleast know that i am not alone or crazy. i'll be more than willing to go into absolute detail.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I thought we were looking at a lifeflight helocopter lifting from hospital. but it kept on rising  until it reached a height that allowed it to mimick a shimmering star.  thats just the beginning. please call me.

content.detailedDescription: I was with my wife and two friends in our trailer on august 1977 and watching a movie together and over my shoulders through the parted curtains of the window behind me on the couch i see this stream of light like a falling star that fell from at the top of the window clear down to the bottom almost, so i told everyone i seen a strange light like a falling star that was moving across the sky, but it was so much slower than a falling star etc.  i went outside immediately to look in the direction of the light and at first seen nothing, then it appeared, this ball of orange/red light at night hovering slowly toward my direction and then it stopped shortly what seemed like about 500-700 feet away or so, then it moved west from me going away and slightly downward. i ran up my drive way and tried to climb upon a fence to see it more. then this ufo with no noise at all, just flew off like flash of light, lightening up the whole sky and followed by a sonic boom. when hovering, this thing was making no noise at all. i ran into my house to tell my wife and friends and my man friend and i drove down another road trying to see if i could find what i had seen and nothing. i suppose it was gone by then. to this day i feel i had seen a real ufo, because for that year of 1977 i had never seen any aircraft as such at night like this and without the noise. everything else like airplanes, helicopters etc have sound. whatever this thing was it left fast and the neighbors all heard the sonic boom and it made all the dogs bark right after that. from all the descriptions of other, people's ufo's this one was similar to them. i am not sure why this thing appeared as basketball size to me, but it was at least 500-700 feet from me going through the tree's real low before it disappeared. the next few days a friend had said that he was told that other people had seen what i had seen that same night. this has never left my mind all these years trying to imagine what it might have been, since never seeing anything ever to match what i had seen since then. i do believe in ufo's from afar or today maybe the government has them, not sure yet.
content.summary: Seen star falling from sky for long time then object near me glowing orange/red color,no noise until flash light with sonic boom sound when it left

content.detailedDescription:
It was a warm, clear saturday evening in the suburbs of portland.  i returned from the theater with my mother and we both decided to sit outside on her back deck and enjoy the warm weather.  it was exceptionally dark and, living in los angeles, i noticed that the sky was clear and you could see an abundance of stars.  the time was approximately 9:30-10pm on 7/19/14.

as i'm looking at the big pine trees surrounding her neighbors' houses, my mother comments on an airplane that is flying across the sky.  the object was far enough away that i could not detect a shape, size, etc.  it simply looked, at that time, like an airplane in the air flying at a distance with a solid white light.  the object was flying in a straight line, but much more quickly than an airplane would that far away would.  normal circumstances would dictate that, at that distance from the earth, the plane would appear as if it were flying very slowly for those on the ground.

the object flies across the sky at a steady, quick rate for approximately 3-4 seconds and stops in mid-air.  it doesn't appear to move, just stop dead in its tracks.  we stare at the object and each other and comment on the fact that the light/airplane is stopped in mid-air.  2-3 seconds later, the object's light starts to brighten in strength and intensity so much so that the light becomes unbelievably bright and you're almost forced to look away.  it was a steady increase and did not pulse, etc. it was a consistent brightness.  but at the distance away from the earth, it would not have been too noticeable unless you were specifically looking up in that direction.  the neighborhood is very quiet, and i didn't notice any activity that late.

before we could comment on the object again while it was stagnant in the air and the white light intensity had increased with such immense power, the object suddenly and without warning took off at a very, very quick pace.  from my perception on the ground, the object appeared to travel away and up from me as i could see a slight tail in the light before it completely disappeared out of tight within just 2 seconds.  the speed at which the object accelerated and disappeared was astonishing.

my mother and i both looked at each other in disbelief.  we did not hear any sounds, see any other colors from the object except a while, bright light.  but i do know that no manmade object can travel at those speeds, stop dead in the air for seconds on end, and then abruptly and without warning change directions and accelerate out of site at an enormously quick rate.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright white object stops in dead air, changes direction with unparalleled speed

content.detailedDescription: I was in the gulf coast of florida for vacation when my father, friends, and fianceé witnessed a strange light in the sky. the light would appear randomly between midnight and two am. it would hover over the ocean. it happened about three times over a week. my mother and i had witnessed a star like light, that would flash random colors, that was stationary for an hour or so fly over us. it was triangular and left bizarre light streaks. i ran inside grabbed my dslr camera and took a photo to only have  a row of four light streaks with a dot in the middle. the pictures mysteriously disappeared. within minutes military jets were out and helicopters. on the last night of the event i tried to capture the star like ufo light and my camera refused to take photos, then i used the stargazing app to see if a star was in that spot and my phone died. i had several photos of the light being in different positions, colors, and streaks and they weren't on the memory card when loaded. on the second night of the event my friend and i were walking on the beach looking for shells when the light appeared at random like before. it was flashing bizarre patterns and changing elevations. i have never seen a star do this, also there were a couple of planes that passed over head before and the light patterns were no where close. my friend and i had led lights, and thought it would be funny to flash sos like patterns. all of a sudden it changed light patterns and elevation, then an orange spot light like light reflected off the ocean's surface. then soon after disappeared. no star, plane, nor flashlight reflected that color or way. no plane or star reflected that light. the moon didn't even reflect that strong. the only photos i have are taken with a cell phone. they are low quality(pretty much worthless) and only show the light in they sky in one photo and not in the next, accompanied by the star gazing app that shows no star was in that section. the star gazing app was very accurate. it lined up almost perfectly with other stars in the sky. pictures are labeled. the first label is just the black sky, and a minute later the second photo shows the light. the third shows the star gazing app and how it shows the absence of a star.
content.summary: Flashing lights unlike stars, planes, etc over the ocean. it was stationary then flew over top. appeared and disappeared randomly for 3 days

content.detailedDescription: Object was observed at norad entrance and then in seconds went to the air force academy and back to the norad entrance. hovered there for several minutes and zoomed over pikes peak and disappeared. news the next day said it was just a stunt for a future movie, however, no movie ever was made. i am not sure as to the date but my daughter was with me and she was about 3 or 4. the object did not return and has never been seen again.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Round with flashing lights under unit

content.detailedDescription:
Date--1/2 time san francisco-seattle 2013 playoff in san francisco. date??? i went out at half time--looked to the south at cuchara pass. the soft flood light was higher than the road over the pass, moving into cuchara valley. i waited for a back wash sound, but there was absolutely no sound. the movement was very slow, you could not see the outline behind the large light.. the direction changed after 4-5 minutes of it's ascending into the valley. it then turned up a cut in the mountains toward a couple of mountain lakes, disappearing behind the pines surround my place.
i was so aggravated--i had company and she did not hear my call to come out of the house. i thought then--i've seen a ufo--no one else got a look at it...
however i went to my best friends the next morning for coffee.. i just casually ask, did you guys see anything unuseal last night. the wife came to a stop--looked at me, "she called me by name, "did you see that light"?? (she had taken her pups out for a bathroom run)i told her i did, and she was as please as i, to have a witness--her husband did not see it.. this couple and i are retired folks from texas..
that entire day (this happen), there were high fly overs.. this large light could have been a drome, and the military fly overs-- an exercise. i'm trying as you see to be honest about this.. do dromes fly with a bigger than life flood light after it's dark??????????? i don't have a clue.......
understand this--you required a description of the structure.. it was dark--you could not see the structure of the object behind the light!!!!!
content.summary: Only saw a flood light movine very slowly-no sound what soever

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my balcony, watching a thunderstorm at about 8:55 pm on june 5th 2015 when i noticed a green lighted oblect in the sky after the lightning had gone. i thought it was a plane however it did not move at all. it stayed perfectly still for about 4 minuted before descending slowly straight down below the treetops. after i lost sight of it. i felt very excited and confused.
content.summary: A single round green light hovered in a lightning storm for 4 minutes then descended slowly

content.detailedDescription:
Traveling back to our vacation home at around 11pm on a dark road in a rural area, having just got onto i91 south coming from i89 south outside of west lebanon new hampshire my girlfriend and i observed a bright glowing object, circular in shape, drop down into our view from the top of the windshield, and proceed to drop at a steady rate until it reached the tree line, where it passed behind the trees, still moving down toward the ground, and disappeared. it happened very fast, the whole sighting lasting less than 10 seconds. at first i thought it was a meteorite, but there was no trail and it appeared to be descending straight down at a fast but steady rate. it was a clear night and we could see the stars. the object was much larger that the stars, appearing probably about the size of a penny compared to the stars being a pin prick.There was no sound and no sign of any hard impact with the ground. it just glided straight down and went behind the trees. the object was bright white, circular, and seemed to glow, having no hard edges.
i saif to my girlfriend 'did you see that?' and she said yes, then described the same thing i had seen.
i have worked for an airline, and am used to seeing aircraft lights at night, and this looked nothing like anything i've ever seen.
content.summary: Bright glowing object descending behind tree line on rural road

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
As far as i can remember, since i was 6 or 7 years old, and not really knowing exactly how, (i guess it was because of the interest i’ve always had in astrophysics), that my life started centering around the ufo phenomena. as well as anyone with a deep interest on this kind of subject, i’ve always dreamed of having a true ufo sighting experience, although this was something i was doubtfully sure of, until something happened on the month of august 2013.
one day i went to meet with a chinese colleague of mine to this hotel where he was staying at in downtown la paz. during the morning hours, we stayed in his room talking a bit about everything, and as the tv was on we started watching a rerun of the ufo hunters series on the history channel, while from time to time i was translating to him from spanish to chinese the most relevant and interesting of the contents that were discussed about the ufo phenomena.
at around 5:00 in the afternoon, we took a taxi straight to the airport to change the departure date of our flight to colombia. at around 08:00 in the evening the same day, we took another taxi from the airport back to downtown la paz, riding down a quite long and winding highway, which links the el alto (city) international airport located at an altitude of 4100 m.A.S.L., with the city of la paz located on a very large valley area at an average altitude of 3.850 m.A.S.L.
surrounding the upper part of the la paz city valley, there is a large mountainous chain that is part of the andes cordillera, which during moonless nights cannot be seen because of the height and the distance they are located at. the only thing that can be seen on one of these mountains at nighttime, are 3 quite bright yellow lights that are arranged in a left to right diagonal array, the ones which during nighttime seem to be suspended in the night sky.
in fact, the previous year in 2012, as i was making my way back from the airport at similar nighttime hours, for the first time i noticed those 3 bright yellow lights suspended on the left side of the sky over the valley. thinking that those possibly were 3 ufos suspended in close formation, i asked the taxi driver what those lights were all about, and to my disappointment he told me those were the 3 main lights of a water reservoir that channels the water from the melting ice caps from the surrounding mountain tops and used as a main water supply for the city of la paz down the rest of the valley area.
while remembering all that, and after discussing about the ufo topic during the morning hours, i was there watching again those bright yellow lights of the water reservoir that evening, and suddenly i decided to play a joke to my chinese workmate, making him believe that those reservoir lights were 3 ufos suspended in close formation, and see what kind of reaction i could get out of him, just for the sake of my own pleasure. i ended up feeling very satisfied finding out that my chinese workmate reacted in awe-striking amazement thinking that those lights were real ufos, while i was doing my best effort not to laugh at him loudly and making him find out it was a joke.
while this was happening, i looked to the right side over the same mountain range, and suddenly saw 3 other bright yellow lights that were also arranged in exactly the same left to right diagonal array formation having exactly the same altitude and distance as the water reservoir lights had!; (possibly might have been apparent altitude and distance that coincided with the reservoir lights). now, those newly discovered lights were something i have never ever seen or known of before, and starting to feel a strange sensation inside of me, i fixed my sight on those 3 lights and noticed that they were around five times bigger than the water reservoir lights. those strange lights kept their formation and position for around 3 minutes, and then they suddenly changed their position to a perfectly horizontal one, keeping their new position and distance for around 2 more minutes. from time to time, i could not see those lights because of the trees and houses set on along the winding highway, but as we were driving along, i noticed that those light were approaching more and more towards our direction, as if knowing that i was observing them. then i pointed out to those lights and i asked the taxi driver what those lights could be, and after him almost hardly looking at them, told me that it was just a another airplane making its way to the airport. it took around 5 minutes for those 3 lights to fly from their initial location to a place close to where we were, which i guess was an approximate distance of about 20 km, which tells me that those light were flying at a speed of an airplane. as those light were just about over the highway, the lights changed their former horizontal array to such a way that i ended up seeing a perfectly hexagonal array of 6 yellow bright lights with a twice as big red bright light located in the middle of the hexagonal formation! to my surprise, i found out that instead of 6 + 1 separate lights/objects flying in hexagonal formation, those where the lights of one single black hexagonal ufo, which i guess was about 20 to 25 meters in diameter suddenly flying at a much slower speed above us heading to el alto city were the airport is, at an altitude by then of about 30 meters from the highway, making no noise whatsoever!
i was so amazed watching this object hat i kept myself quiet without saying a single word to my chinese workmate, until the object flew past by and disappeared over the high plateau of el alto city. i finally don’t know why this sighting was never shown on the news or talked about by anyone else being a fact to me that it really happened and we were altogether 3 eyewitnesses to it!
as this is the first ufo sighting experience i’ve had till now, after i file in this report, i will further analyze and estimate more accurately the initial distance and altitude that the ufo had from the location of the highway where our taxi was running at and the resulting speed the ufo flew at, as well as other details of the more accurate dimensions of the object, etc. i am willing to answer any questions that you might have in the most sincere and accurate way i can.
by the way, i once remember watching a mufon tv program about a guy near philadelphia also saw an hexagonal-shaped ufo flying near his house during a rainy thunderstorm evening… could you please provide me with any most detailed information about this peculiar hexagonal-shaped ufo that i’ve witnessed, where they come from and what kind of aliens maneuver them, etc. i will most gladly and thankfully appreciate it!
content.summary: Hexagonal ufo
content.locationName: Nuestra Señora de La Paz, La Paz Department

content.detailedDescription: My cousins and i were out spotting deer at night 5 miles from the family hunting camp in fort maccoy fl. the jeep we were in ran out of gas so my oldest cousin ,pete shined the spot light in the sky to see how high the beam would travel. when noticed a star the beam was pointed at moved,so pete moved the light to its new location which seemed like inches. then in an instant the entire area around us was lit with the purest white light that i  ever saw or have seen since. it was an area about the size of a football field . as bright as the light was you could see a brighter orb or disc shape at tree top level approx. 120-150 feet high. i'm not sure how long it was there but in an instant it shot upwards and disappeared. there were 4of us and we've not spoke of it since
content.summary: A pin point in the night sky came down to tree top level, the light was white and the trees cast no shadows then zipped straight up and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: My wife let out our dogs. i went out on the front porch and sat down.  to the east about  a half mile away i saw four red orange balls of light in a v formation traveling south slowly with absolutely no noise. the lights looked like they may be attached to a boomerang object possibly 500 feet from the front light to the rear left light. there were two lights behind the front light on the left and one light behind the front light on the right.  i called for my wife to grab her camera.  she took three good photos with her cell phone .  the pictures clearly show the v formation. as we watched for almost 3 minutes the formation of lights ascended up into the clouds and disappeared from our view.  as the lights moved in formation there stayed a constant distance between the lights.
content.summary: Saw four lights in v formation silent for 3 minutes

content.detailedDescription: My mom was taking pictures of the amount of hail and water the storm was bringing,and caught on camera beams of light and a weird apparition. (pic with white car) look in center at the orb and behind it, it looks like a worm shape. and the odd pattern of the beams coming from what looks like above the house. (pic with the street lamp in it) to me it looks like the beams might be coming from the ground not beaming down on it. she did not see any of this with the naked eye.
content.summary: Not seen with human eye but caught on camera during a hail storm

content.detailedDescription: I was in the swimming pool in indy thats been 15 years ago ..The wife pointed the object out to me.It was several maybe 3 balls 10 foot in diameter with a square box underneath..The object was just over the tree tops above the house next door ..It was silent and moved very slow ..But did not waiver like a ballon..I jumped oit of the pool and followed it around front of my house i was pointing and freaking out..There were kids across the street looking at melike i had libsters coming out of my ears as i was pointing and freaking out and yelling ..It was right above them ..But they were lookin at me...If it was ours it was very advanced tech..This was 15 years ago so the month and the date and time i have submitted are inacurate ..It was in the summer because we were playing in the pool
content.summary: Several m\silver balls 10 foot in diameter attached with a square box underneath silver base color pulsing metallic color on its surfaces

content.detailedDescription: We where at moffet field to work at the commisarry. wanted a pic of the hanger because its been stripped and it looks a really cool. it was early morning so nothing was flying yet then the object appeared. i didn't notice it until i was gonna take the pic of the hanger. i looked everywhere for planes and seen none. first it was just hovering then darted about 4 times in all directions but just short burst then hovered again before disappearing while not looking tryn to get cell to zoom in clearly. i do believe in life elsewhere however never thought i would see such an obviously perfect proof.The pix are just from a cell phone and i have the originals on the phone still for proof of no trickery.
content.summary: Object hovered and moved in a manner i never thought possable

content.detailedDescription:
I was heading to work at 6:30 am in the morning, heading east on douglas road in rancho cordova.  i sighted the object as i neared grantline road and pulled over to take a picture.  i then continued to sight the object all the way into work (iron point circle, folsom, ca).  i took another picture and video of the object from the parking lot at work.

thinking this was possibly a hot air balloon, i contacted the major tour website out of rancho murieta, and asked if they had a black or dark grey balloon in the air at that time.  below is the response i received:

"we don't have any black balloons or grey balloons in our fleet.  what did you see and where?  there are not really supposed to be any other folks flying out here though it was windy and someone may have launched from the wilton/ione area. a guy named [name removed/cms/jpg] is out there sometimes.

blue skies"

note:  i left his person information off to protect his privacy

today, june 5th, at around 6:09 am i saw actual balloons in the sky in the same approximate area.  they were defined in shape, and looked nothing like what i saw on the 4th.  please see attach photo from my cell phone.
content.summary: Dark round shaped object seen in the early morning sky

content.detailedDescription:
This happened in aug-sept 1988 while at the navy recruit base in illinois.
our company was in the 2nd story of a 3 story barracks. i was in the back of the barracks around 2am on "watch duty". very tired i lad down in a empty rack and closed my eyes. i was startled when i perceived light through my closed eyes and sat up quickly thinking i was busted by a company commander or someone had the barracks lights on. when i sat up though there were no lights on and everything was quiet. i slowly walked to the aisle way and looked and listened for anything. nothing. i knew something was shining in my eyes so i walked the length of the barracks (maybe 150 ft)to the "front watchman". i asked him who came in to the barracks. he looked at me weird and responded no one.I told him i had seen a bright light and asked him where it came from. he said outside. i knew this was extremely bright like a flash light being directed in to my eyes and asked him what the heck was it. he replied that he wasn't sure. maybe a car.... i dropped it and we talked for maybe 2 minutes when i began to walk back to my posted area. i took maybe 3 steps and the whole barracks lit up light it was day light outside. i stood there looking at everyone in their racks wondering how they are not waking up to this bright light. i turned to the other watch and said there is no way a car is doing this and headed toward the windows that ran the length of the barracks. the bottom panes were frosted so you couldn't see standing on the floor. we jumped up on top of the radiators that ran down the wall and looked out the clear panes. we were in the second to last barracks on the base. just on the other side of the last barracks looked like an huge beam of light coming up on the far side of this last barracks. i try to explain it looking like a football stadium with light pouring out from the bright lights. after maybe 5-10 seconds of trying to analyze the light a long oval slowly appeared on the back side and steadily rose a couple stories above the 3 story barracks and then stopped and hovered in place. super bright white light. i could not make out any details anywhere within this huge object. just solid white end to end, top to bottom. i could feel reverberations, pulsating from the object. almost like a generator but very deep in tone and fairly slow in frequency.I could feel the window pain vibrating and even feel it in my chest. as i watched this and took it all in i asked the other watch what he thought it could be. he responded he had no idea and asked what i thought it could be. i said ufo and all he could do was nod his head. i studied it in the 20-30 seconds it was there trying to take in every detail. waiting for the next move when it just completely vanished. like someone turned off a light switch. no more sound and no other light. just gone. i was shaken from witnessing the event and my heart was racing. i knew i had just seen something unusual. we reported the event to the company commander the next morning and never heard anything about it again. we didnt get to investigate the other side of that barracks. we were in boot camp. i always wondered if the first time i saw the light if the object was actually descending. i went on to have a 7 year career in aviation. electrician on the f-14 and never to this day have ever witnessed anything close to this that would even begin to explain that night.
content.summary: Very big. estimate 250-300 ft. 2-3 stories tall. solid white light.

content.detailedDescription:
On this day i was working at the kitchen table on my hobby around 4:pm. when i decided to go outside to get just some fresh air. as i come out the door the uao appeared just over the houses up the street it was like a big burger except for meat it had darken windows. i immediately ran back in to get my camera, the battery was dead. no proof i went back out it was gone. i placed the camera on charge. 
later on that evening the camera was charged for some reason i went outside again and there it was back again directly overhead this time. i ran back in again got the camera and took the video. as a point of reference there are stars also in the video as you watch it move up and down. near the end as it comes into view clouds start to roll in fast and block it out. each time i saw it i was over whelmed. believe it or not also it has taken me this long to report it because i have had 3 pc crash continuously.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It keeps coming back

content.detailedDescription:
I could not possibly cover everything. let me give u a backround. i was raised in a nursing home parkway rest home.My mother worked for my father who owned it. strange things occured in this old victorian house. my issues began at five. recurring dreams of men in black suits..Eye in the corner of my room. orbs in the nursing home . mom would go into trances and speak in other languages trying to keep somethings away from me..Astral projection was normal for her. i would wake up with black and blue marks. dogs when in the apartment would have hair raised barking at something no one can see. dreams began to come true. shadows moving feeling of cold hair rising on neck..Feeling someone sit on the bed,but no one is seen...(that happensvall the time even now)
patients in the nursing home talking about lights telling them to follow, them. when i had my first child i saw an orb hovering over his crib (i thought it was his father because he died before he was born)..It stayed for a while then disappeared. when i was pregnant with my daughter i saw an orb.Coming down the stairs ..It did not shine in anything the light stayed inside. it stayed long enough for me to take a good look at i did not know i was pregnant when this happened..My mother often said she would go into space and when her siblings found her they would have to shake her for a response. she would always be under a tree. my mother also did what i know now...Is automatic writing,speaking to the dead who would tell her true events which would actually take place. she also astral project. she has seen things happen to me that i did not tell her about..Such as when i was almost killed twice.. she also would speak in other languages and not remember when it was over..My grandmother also did that but she could heal people. in my dreams i received a guide to assist me in dealing with the stressful and unusual dreams. they show me things i later look up or come across information about things..Fear left.. i have dreamed people who have told me they were going to die before they actually did die. including my father and my sons father...I draw what i see in my sleep. sometimesi know i have really been some where. when i was four and up i always told my mom i want to go home..She would say you are home ...I would tell her this is not our home. my daughter also..She would always want me to pick her up and take her outside at night so she could point at the sky...Later.  is it apiritual or alien..Many more experiences...Would like to speak in person with someone.  i work in a profession where this kind of discussion will get you relieved of duty.. but i would like an explanation...My mother has had visions dreams and premonitions that have come true very often...
content.summary: Several diffrent accounts after talking to investigator. i realized many of the terrifying experiences i previously believed were spiritual my have been alien in origin. i have nevered disussed this except with family who has had similar experiences

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my half hour lunchbreak at work about 12 am. i was sitting outside in the courtyard and, as always, i was looking at the stars. suddenly i saw a large black trianglular craft above me with four white, unblinking lights. one on each corner and one in the center.

it was totally silent. i remember realizing it was a ufo and i remember wanting to go get someone else to come see it... but i was totally drawn into it... i had to stay and watch. it moved slowly in a straight line from north to south.

i wish i could explain it's true size. because it was silent i assumed it was high in the sky, from my vantage point i could put it at about the size of a baseball. it took my entire lunchbreak to finally leave my sight.... this was only because i was in an interior courtyard and the craft passed beyond the edge of the far end of the building.

when it finally left my sight i realized i could go get someone now... but alas, it was already gone. also, when i looked at my watch, what seemed just a few minutes was actually the entire legnth of my break plus a couple extra minutes!

my mother also saw this same type of craft several times. their bedroom had several very large, clear skylights and being an insomniac she often layed awake staring at the stars. on several occasions she saw this same craft. i didn't know this until i told her about what i'd seen and she told me then of her own experiences.

the large triangular crafts seem to concentrate here in the prescott skies. it would be interesting if someday a true field experience could document this familiar sight in our skies!
content.summary: While on graveyard shift and on my half hour lunch break i saw a huge and silent craft above.

content.detailedDescription: I was waiting for the bus. so i sat down on the bench and was cloud watching(we have great clouds here in and around cincinnati) and saw the silver saucer shape, at first i wasn't sure what i was looking at then it moved quickly up down and then shot off to the right and was gone i looked around at the others waiting for the same bus and they were all looking down the street for the bus i almost said " hay! did u guys see that!! and then realized i better not say anything and so that is it... that is what happened and i never saw another one. however when i got some pictures from travels in the baja there was a big gray spot on one of them i kept it, although my husband says it is a flock of birds...And i did not see anything in the sky when i took the picture...I would have noticed a flock of birds...
content.summary: Bright silver, saucer shaped

content.detailedDescription:
I have spent nearly my whole life looking at the sky. i am an amatuer to be sure, however, i've looked at the sky long enough to know what belongs there and what does not. my greatest disappointment is that this experience was so quick i had no time to photograph it! you'll just have to take my word for it.

as on most nights i was outside watching the stars. i was facing south and on the far outskirts of town so the stars weren't hazed out. i looked up toward a tree on the property and saw a "blue star" about as big as venus when at it's closest... pretty big, very blue and had white kind of light
shining out around it. after 2 or maybe 3 seconds it began to "open". imagine looking at a clamshell headon when it's open wide. it has a center point of connection with ever expanding edges flaring out above and below it with no matter in between the edges of the top shell and the edges of the bottom shell.

this is as close to an anology of what i saw as i can come. as i watched the "star" (a star that clearly didn't belong there)it opened up and as i watched the blue center of the star became inceasingly smaller untill at last the "clamshell" closed and left no sign of the blue "star" i had just been looking at!

i wrote my husband the next day to tell him about it and even included a hand drawn diagram of what i'd seen. he thinks i'm nuts but i know what i saw and it was nothing i've ever seen before, even after some 53 years watching the skys.

i'll have to look for the saved letter to attach a copy of my sketch. sorry i didn't do that before posting to this site. one last thing... this isnt the first sighting i have had here in prescott, just the most remarkable. ive had one more experience and my now deceased mother had several encounters as well. prescott az. is pretty hot with activity.
content.summary: I believed i witnessed a portal in space opening up.

content.detailedDescription: I awoke to take the dog out to handle its business. once outside, i noticed multiple hovering lights, the size of a basketball. the lights changed colors and descended slowly, after at least one minute of hovering, the lights quickly ascended and changed directions from east to west, then again from west to east at a phenomenal rate of a speed. the light vanished to the east. i could not track them. i was in a state of shock. i stood outside for several minutes trying to rationalize exactly what i witnessed. i am still in a state of disbelief.
content.summary: Multiple hovering lights that descended and quickly ascended, changing directions at a incredible rate of speed.

content.detailedDescription: I was siding my garage, my girlfriend pointed it out to me. it flew directly overhead and was observed by myself, my girlfriend and our neighbors. it flew from the south to the north and maintained a steady altitude and speed. it moved too quickly for me to get my phone to document it. it was very clear to make out that it was orb shaped and literally on fire but there was no smoke or any sort of contrails. it was maybe 2000 ft at altitude. it also moved quickly and completely silently. it was clearly flying and not falling or crashing as one would assume seeing an aircraft on fire.
content.summary: Fireball moving quickly, south to north. completely silent.

content.detailedDescription: I went out side to take a pee off my deck overlooking the lake when i noticed a low flying bright light.(i am a pilot and my head is always looking up.)i was wondering why this plane is so low with landing lights on when it came to a hover. the bright light shut off and with the moon so bright the object reflected a aluminum cylinder shape about 100 ft long 20 ft diam.As i stood in awe a police helicopter was making its routing shore line patrol and came to a stop then veering to the north east.I know they were also watching this object.The object then started going towards the coast at 25-35 knots glowing from the moon shine reflection.Know the crazy part is that i lost 20 minutes in a trance or just blanked out standing with my head caulked looking into the sky.My friend came over and walked out on the deck seeing i was acting funny not responding to him.When i came too i explained to him what i witnessed.That eve i fell asleep at my kitchen island watching a movie with my friend on couch,he said i started talking in another language that he could not understand.This would be my 5th experience seeing a ufo but the most intense.Wow.
content.summary: Bright light going se over lake at 1500-2000 ft.Object stopped and hovered with light shutting off.Bright moon showed cylinder object.

content.detailedDescription: Black helicopter seen during daytime flying low over house the day of and the next also saw a fighter jet not even 5 mins after seeing ufo. it was low enough to that i could tell it was similar to an a-10 warthog. in the video the bottom light is my neighbors house across the street. i was outside smoking with my fiancé when the light just appeared suddenly so i took a picture and video on my front porch. after floating/ hovering around it moved from left to right ascended some turned left quickly and vanished.
content.summary: Bright light just appeared seemed to hover then ascend and move side to side turn left quickly and disappear

content.detailedDescription:
When clouds gather,

sitting outside during break at work (neovia) i look straight up at the clouds (storm) and see a clear outline of a black triangle, with the center filled with a cloud like appearance or just the clouds, because of the low clouds and stormy weather it looked like it was hovering just at the edge of the cloud formation, lasting for about a minute. it slowy dissapeared in the clouds seemingly gaining altitude.
content.summary: Black triangle ufo

content.detailedDescription: Me and my father were cooking something over our camp fire when we first noticed this strange object in the sky in front of us above the mountains. we first noticed the object when we seen a extremely bright star in the sky. we thought it was a star at fist then it started to change colors (red, white, blue, orange) and move from side to side, up and down, kind of like a triangle. at first i didn't really feel weird about it until recently when i found an article on the internet stating basically the same exact thing me and my father had see. the article reads as followed "a brilliant object appeared and moved in a sporatic manner along horizon changing color often and location colors of red blue and white visibleat approximately 0200 on 7/12/98 a bright red/blue/white object appeared on horizon. being that this area has an airport we thought it was a plane heading for landing. this is not a big airport so a long stand by for landing was not probable. the object appeared to move closer and farther away, and changes in color happened quite frequently. it moved up/down and left/right in a smooth and quick manner and did not appear to follow any pattern normally seen in a satellite, plane, or falling star. the object was watched by 3-4 people for upto 1 hour until it moved to a point out of vision range behing a mountain on the horizon. intensity of the light changed frequently and dimming of the light on the object was followed by bright flashes of light along the horizon for quite a distance. during the time object was visible periodic flashes of light around the object were noticed in different colors." the object stayed around for about an hour or more and moved to the middle of the triangle it was forming and shot off in the distance. would love to get in contact with someone or people who share this similar experiance. thanks for your time and interest in this long statement.
content.summary: Changed colors in a triangular motion
